item.title: AccorHotels introduces a new combined Pullman & Novotel hotel in New Delhi Aerocity
item.description:
Source: AccorHotels. Lobby, Novotel New Delhi Aerocity. AccorHotels has recently launched a new project: a combined Pullman & Novotel in New Delhi Aerocity, adding 670 internationally-standard rooms near the Indian capital. This opening marks the 100th Pullman hotel worldwide. Guests staying at either hotel can enjoy the shared dining and leisure facilities. The complex centers around a garden and heated outdoor pool, housing two of AccorHotels’ most well-known brands. The Pullman New Delhi offers diverse dining options, including: “Pluck,” a farm-to-table restaurant with a seasonal menu; a delicatessen caf√© serving a variety of teas, coffees, beverages, and freshly baked goods; and “Honk,” their signature restaurant, specializing in upscale Asian street food...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/accorhotels-introduces-a-new-combined-pullman-novotel-hotel-in-new-delhi-aerocity/
